enhanced_by.reason: The retainAll method may need to add elements to the bag, similar to the add method.
The retainAll method may need to remove elements from the bag, similar to the remove method.
The retainAll method may need to check if all elements in the collection are contained in the bag, similar to the containsAll method.
The retainAll method iterates over the bag's elements, which requires the iterator method to be invoked first.
